decimalPlaces.name: Decimal places
decimalPlaces.hint: Distances will be rounded to show no more decimal places that the defined here. Distances with less decimal places will be presented WITHOUT adding padding zeros to the right.

enabled.name: Show distance on hover
enabled.hint: Whether to so the token the distance between the selected token and the hovered one.

forceEuclidean.name: Always use euclidean distance
forceEuclidean.hint: Use euclidean distance even when the game system offers a way to calculate the distance (a.k.a same distance as ruler). Otherwise euclidean distance will only be used when no other method is available.

normalizeSubSquareCreatures.name: Normalize sub-square creatures
normalizeSubSquareCreatures.hint: Treat creatures that occupy less than square like they occupy the full square. This may produce results more in line with what one expects when a grid is in-place but less accurate for gridless maps.
